Gear.name: Fender Precision Bass
Gear.description: Mexican made fender Mid 1990's. Purple body. Klein 62' Pbass pickups. Seafoam green pickguard. Metalic bridge cover.

Gear.name: Fender Telecastor
Gear.description: Candy Apple Red with white pickguard. Made in Japan. Red toggle swith top. Mid 1990's model. Rosewood frett board.

Gear.name: Ernie Ball Music Man Sting Ray Bass
Gear.description: Made in AMERICA! Light blue with dark pearl pick guard. Spotted Maple neck. Mute pads on bridge. Best Bass EVER!

Gear.name: Yamaha A1M Acoustic Guitar
Gear.description: Tan Yamaha acoustic with cutaway. Electronic. Made in China.

Gear.name: Dean VX
Gear.description: Red, Green, and Black spill paint coat. Screamin Demon neck pickups and Seth Lover Humbucker. Drop C tunning.

Gear.name: Fender California Series PJ 4 String Bass.
